data.text:
1. What's the Britannia Industries Ltd share price today?

Britannia Industries Ltd share price was Rs 5,742.85 at close on 9th Aug 2024 . Britannia Industries Ltd share price was up by 0.14 % over the previous closing price of Rs 5,735.00 . Britannia Industries Ltd share price trend:

Last 1 Month: Britannia Industries Ltd share price moved up by 1.25 % on BSE

Last 3 Months: Britannia Industries Ltd share price moved up by 13.17 % on BSE

Last 12 Months: Britannia Industries Ltd share price moved up by 24.72 % on BSE

Last 3 Years: Britannia Industries Ltd price moved up by 57.93 % on BSE

2. How can I quickly analyse the performance of the Britannia Industries Ltd stock?

The performance of the Britannia Industries Ltd stock can be quickly analysed on the following metrics:

The stock's PE is 62.61

Price to book value ratio is 35.08

Dividend yield of 1.28

The EPS (trailing 12 months) of the Britannia Industries Ltd stock is Rs 91.68

3. What is the market cap of Britannia Industries Ltd ?

Britannia Industries Ltd has a market capitalisation of Rs 1,38,345 crore.

4. What is Britannia Industries Ltd 's 52-week high/low share price?

The Britannia Industries Ltd ’s 52-week high share price is Rs 6,007.95 and 52-week low share price is Rs 4,349.95 .

5. Is the Britannia Industries Ltd profitable?

On a consolidated basis, Britannia Industries Ltd reported a profit of Rs 502.08 crore on a total income of Rs 4,161.73 crore for the quarter ended 2024 . For the year ended Jun 2024 , Britannia Industries Ltd had posted a profit of Rs 504.88 crore on a total income of Rs 4,305.90 crore.

6. Which are Britannia Industries Ltd ’s peers in the Agri and agri inputs sector?

Britannia Industries Ltd ’s top 5 peers in the Agri and agri inputs sector are Nestle India, Varun Beverages, Godrej Consumer, Britannia Inds., Dabur India, Colgate-Palmoliv, P & G Hygiene .
